CustomField.formula: IF ( CRM_C_OpInCorsoGP__c = '1', IMAGE('/resource/PICO_Error', "Error", 16, 16), IF ( CRM_C_OpInCorsoGP__c = '2', IMAGE('/resource/PICO_Neutral', "Neutral", 16, 16), IF ( CRM_C_OpInCorsoGP__c = '3', IMAGE('/resource/PICO_Success', "Success", 16, 16), IF ( CRM_C_OpInCorsoGP__c = '4', IMAGE('/resource/PICO_Exclamation_1', "Exclamation point 1", 16, 16), IF ( CRM_C_OpInCorsoGP__c = '5', IMAGE('/resource/PICO_Exclamation_2', "Exclamation point 2", 16, 32), NULL ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Operazioni in corso su GP
